response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product, which holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am confident it will significantly contribute to your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am extending to you a special offer to purchase this product at a price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its true value and presents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at an advantageous rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
